mapper.select: SELECT c.no, c.name, c.cover_img coverImg,c.intro,min_age minAge,max_age maxAge,max_pop maxPop,cur_pop curPop,category_no categoryNo,c.regdate,avg_age avgAge,gender_rate genderRate,point FROM crew_members m, crews c WHERE m.user_no=#{no} AND m.crew_no = c.no ORDER BY 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO crews(no, name, cover_img, intro, min_age, max_age, max_pop, cur_pop, category_no,gender_rate,avg_age,point, regdate) VALUES(crews_seq.nextval, #{name},#{coverImg} ,#{intro}, #{minAge}, #{maxAge}, #{maxPop},#{curPop} ,#{categoryNo},#{genderRate},#{avgAge},#{point} , systimestamp)

SELECT m.name meetingName,c.name crewName,m.start_date meetingDate,m.meeting_no no,c.cover_img crewImg,r.win win,r.lose lose,r.draw draw FROM(SELECT m.apply_crew_no crew_no,s.name name,s.start_date start_date,s.no meeting_no FROM schedules s, meet_apps m WHERE s.no = m.meeting_no AND s.type = 'M' AND m.acceptance = 'A' AND systimestamp > s.end_date AND s.crew_no = #{crewNo} UNION SELECT s.crew_no,s.name name,s.start_date start_date,s.no meeting_no FROM schedules s, meet_apps m WHERE s.no = m.meeting_no AND s.type = 'M' AND m.acceptance = 'A' AND systimestamp > s.end_date AND m.apply_crew_no = #{crewNo}) m, crews c,(SELECT w.no, win,lose,draw FROM(SELECT c.no, NVL(r.cnt,0) win FROM(SELECT crew_no, COUNT(*) cnt FROM records WHERE type='W' GROUP BY crew_no) r, crews c WHERE c.no = r.crew_no(+)) w,
(SELECT c.no, NVL(r.cnt,0) lose FROM(SELECT crew_no, COUNT(*) cnt FROM records WHERE type='L' GROUP BY crew_no) r, crews c WHERE c.no = r.crew_no(+)) l,
(SELECT c.no, NVL(r.cnt,0) draw FROM(SELECT crew_no, COUNT(*) cnt FROM records WHERE type='D' GROUP BY crew_no) r, crews c WHERE c.no = r.crew_no(+)) d WHERE w.no = l.no AND l.no = d.no ) r WHERE c.no = m.crew_no AND c.no = r.no
